message.body: Did you want to see avengers in 3d or normal-like cause the times are different
I am anti-3D if that's okay with you. But I would still see Chernobyl Diaries if you would rather do that
(1/2)I'm with ya. Not a huge fan but it was actually decent in 3d. So then it's playing at 6:30 in cherry hill. Don't worry about c diaries it got terrible
Ha ha. Okay, if you're sure. Are you still cool driving?
I'm a block away, be right there
If you look up the movie on IMDB and look at the FAQ it goes through almost every monster referenced in the film... Craaazy
And you totally nailed the snake reference to Buffy apparently
Haha:What's the sign that Ronald the Intern holds up say? "Trapped in a closet Dragonbat has my scent . Send help!"
Okay, that's a pretty awesome faq. (sorry, didn't see your messages until now)
